"All of a sudden she started to struggle to open her eyes. And so Mark saw that and said--` open your eyes, Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes," recalled Kirsten Gillibrand . She kept struggling and struggling and Mark kept encouraging her. And with in a moment she literally opened her eyes. The doctor was unbelievably excited because this was such great progress. Kirsten Gillibrand became close with Gabrielle Giffords during their time together in the House of Representatives. The senator says she told Gabrielle Giffords that people are pulling for her and are inspired by her courage.
